title: How am I supposed to play Veigar
body:
Veigar needed DFG - I don't think you guys actually appreciated and understood how core that item was for him the Active was what made him able to nuke people down how could riot remove DFG without giving Veigar somesort of compensation like his ult doing 144% of his AP and 96% of his targets that was what DFG turned Veigar's ult into. 

On a side note when is Patch 5.3?

replies.body:
no, he didn't. considering he got free ap, his w has an ap scaling of 1, his r has an ap scaling of 1.2 and does 80% of his enemies ap as extra damage, and he has a 2.5 second stun.
he doesn't need dfg, he doesn't need compensation buffs, git gud, l2play,** f**uck off
